programme.title: Weird, True And Freaky: Real Monsters
programme.desc: Ohjelma listaa kymmenen verisinta hyokkaysta, joiden tekijoina on mm. massiivisia hirvioita, kiemurtelevia kaarmeita, veitsihampaisia kissoja ja merien salakavalia tappajia.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa kaksi puumajaa 13-vuotiaalle esiintyja Grace VanderWaalille. Tiimi rakentaa boheemin klubitalon ja ikkunaseinaisen taideateljeen.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Tiimi etsii Mosambikista hengenvaarallista paholaisenkukan rukoilijasirkkaa. Terien ja koukkujen peittama hyonteinen on lahes huomaamaton, silla se nayttaa trooppiselta kukalta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Alaskan kolmiona tunnetulta alueelta etsitaan siella huhujen mukaan piileskelevia mystisia luontokappaleita.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun taistelee kovassa tuulessa pelastaessaan suloista Tigger-kissaa, joka on ennenkin jaanyt kiikkiin korkeuksiin. Lisaksi Tom tulee hatiin Fritterin luo.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Kausi 1 osa 6/10. Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa. (Treetop Cat Rescue, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Jeff aloittaa elinikaisen haaveensa ja alkaa sopeuttaa Bobia ja Screechia takaisin luontoon. Kalanpyynti on odotettua vaikeampaa ja Bob jaa taidoissa jalkeen.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin sademetsassa tiimi etsii lahes nakymatonta otusta, nimittain pantterikameleonttia. Matelija nayttaa kokeiden perusteella uhmaavan fysiikan lakeja.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elaman jano. Sarjassa seurataan Miami-Daden poliisilaitoksen elainpalveluyksikon tutkijoita taistelussa elaimiin kohdistuvaa julmuutta vastaan.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat soluttautuvat mustaan porssiin taistelemaan laitonta villielainkauppaa vastaan. Kiinni jaanyt laiton myyja menee sekaisin.

programme.title: The Dark Side of the Sun
programme.desc: Vasta hiljattain ovat tutkijat alkaneet ymmartaa lahimman tahtemme eli auringon todellista olemusta. Millainen on sen menneisyys ja tulevaisuus ja miten se vaikuttaa maapalloon?

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa kaksi puumajaa 13-vuotiaalle esiintyja Grace VanderWaalille. Tiimi rakentaa boheemin klubitalon ja ikkunaseinaisen taideateljeen.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos keraa varoja pelastuskeskukselle jarjestamalla Halloween-juhlat. Vanha ystava palaa takaisin, ja Lizzy joutuu vaikeaan irtokoiran pelastustehtavaan keskella yota.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Nelja taistelevaa kissaa on jakanut eraan huushollin kahtia. Kissalan reviiririidat ovat pakottaneet kaksi kissaa elamaan vuosia erakkoina eristyksessa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, USA, 2015)

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perhe elaa ahtaassa kodissa pelastamiensa elainten kanssa. Elaimiin kuuluu mm. kaksi minihevosta, jotka nukkuvat vanhempien makuuhuoneessa! Antonio rakentaa niille tallin.

programme.title: Beast Lands
programme.desc: Yhdessa aseistetun joukon kanssa Dave auttaa suojelemaan Koillis-Intian kylia, joissa riehuvat norsut mellastavat keskella yota.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Villit ja vapaat Brownit elavat Alaskan eramaassa. Seitsenlapsisen perheen elama kaikkien modernien mukavuuksien ulkopuolella riippuu perheenjasenten keskinaisesta yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat soluttautuvat mustaan porssiin taistelemaan laitonta villielainkauppaa vastaan. Kiinni jaanyt laiton myyja menee sekaisin.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Labradorinnoutaja Maxilla on henkilokohtainen siipi talossa. Didga -kissa on niin cool, etta se rullalautailee rannalle ja mini-possu penkoo roskiksia ruokajamien toivossa.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Forrest jaljittaa tutkijan kanssa Newfoundlandista valkosutta, joka julistettiin sukupuuttoon kuolleeksi vuonna 1930. He tapaavat metsastajan, joka vaittaa ampuneensa yhden.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete pystyttaa puumajan McKinley-vuoren Princess Wilderness Lodge -kohteeseen. A-runkoisesta taidonnaytteesta on mahtavat nakymat Alaskan vuoristoon.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kamppailu elamasta. Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat pyrkivat saamaan oikeutta laiminlyodylle koiralle ja sen pennulle, ja tutkija Casadevall rientaa auttamaan Miamin kuumuudessa karsivia koiria.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elaman jano. Sarjassa seurataan Miami-Daden poliisilaitoksen elainpalveluyksikon tutkijoita taistelussa elaimiin kohdistuvaa julmuutta vastaan.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa perheet lahtevat hirvimetsalle. Heimo ja Edna tekevat yhteistyota. Tyler seuraa valttelevaa uroshirvea.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Kalastaja ja tutkimusretkeilija Jeremy Wade etsii Australiasta makeanveden petokalaa, jonka uskotaan kuolleen sukupuuttoon. Mutta mita han loytaakaan?

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 11. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Jeff opettaa karhuja etsimaan luonnosta ruokaa. Kun Bob raapaisee hanta kasivarresta, kieltaytyy han laakintaavusta. Jeff joutuu pohtimaan, milta karhujen lahto pesasta tuntuu.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Henkilokuntaa huolestuttaa, kun rakastettu afrikkalalinen pingviini sairastuu mysteerisesti. Akvaariossa saadaan todistaa uhanalaisen lajin vuosittaista kutemista.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Klinikalle tuodulla koiralla epaillaan murtunutta jalkaa, mutta tri Jeffin diagnoosi kertoo jotain paljon vakavampaa. Lisaksi kissa joutuu pulaan ruokahalunsa takia.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Wild Dubai
programme.desc: Modernin Dubain taakse katkeytyy salaisuus: uskomaton villi luonto, joka kantaa ajatonta yhteytta aavikkoon, mereen ja kansan historiaan ja perinteeseen.

programme.title: Elainlaakarina Alaskassa
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana. Alkaa uusintana.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Canopy Cat Rescue on erikoistunut puihin kiivenneiden kissojen pelastamiseen. Kun nelijalkainen saadaan vihdoin takaisin tukevasti maanpinnalle alkaa selvitystyo, kenen lemmikki on kyseessa.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun uskaltautuu rankkasateeseen palauttaakseen Pepper-villikissan ottoaidilleen, ja Tom kiirehtii pelastamaan turhankin ystavallisen Hanna-kissan korkeuksista.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Hiljattain kuolleen Villalobosin tyontekija Muttin perhe tapaa koiran, jonka mies oli valinnut heille. Tia ja M2 jahtaavat villihanhia lahella koulurakennusta.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Missy-kissa repii aidin ja tyttaren erilleen ja yrittaa viela tappaa perheen toisen kissan, Fluffyn. Jackson kiirehtii hatiin.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Klinikalle tuodulla koiralla epaillaan murtunutta jalkaa, mutta tri Jeffin diagnoosi kertoo jotain paljon vakavampaa. Lisaksi kissa joutuu pulaan ruokahalunsa takia.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen kaksi nigerialaista kaapiovuohta aiheuttaa sekasortoa takapihalla! Antonio tekee pihasta hauskan vuohien leikkikentan, johon kuuluu mm. kiipeilytorni.

programme.title: Return to Shark Island
programme.desc: Reunionin saaren haiden kohtaamiset ovat lisaantyva ongelma ja siksi paikalliset pelkaavat veteen menemista. Haitutkijat tutkivat meneillaan olevaa haikriisia loytaakseen haille ja ihmisille tavan elaa sovussa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alkaa uusintana. Seitsenlapsinen Brownin perhe asuu Alaskan eramaassa. Perheenjasenet ovat riippuvaisia toisistaan yrittaessaan selviytya karussa ymparistossa.

programme.title: Wild Mexico
programme.desc: Wild Mexico

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat tutkivat uutta teoriaa Skotlannin Loch Nessin hirviosta. Olento voi olla paitsi todellinen, myos mahdollisesti vaarallisempi kuin on edes kuviteltu.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii yksinaisella joella.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete lahtee puumaja-lomalle Skandinavian havumetsiin. Matka alkaa Norjan maagisesta TreeTop-hotellista ja jatkuu viela Ruotsin puolelle.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 2. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong heads to the north of Iceland to experience at first hand possibly the worlds most disgusting dish before meeting one of Icelands finest jumper knitters.

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben heads to Slab City in the Californian desert to explore an alternative community.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Ed Gamble and Lou Sanders have been friends for years, so much so that shes bought a his n hers set of driving gloves to tackle a dangerous 1000 kilometres of Iceland.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to New Zealand, where he meets the Long family, who live as hunter-gatherers in the Gorge River area of National Park. He helps dad Robert to hunt for rock lobsters and catch eels, while mum Catherine must climb a sheer waterfall to check for storm damage to the familys gravity-fed water pipe.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory that makes 4 million individual Belgian chocolates every day. Ruth discovers the origin of St Nicholas and later visits a chocolate museum.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: There are about 2,000 thunderstorms taking place on Planet Earth at any given time. Despite their exhilarating beauty, they can be deadly. Given the right conditions, these storms can easily evolve into supercells which can then produce hurricanes and tornadoes.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: Pilot of Life Below Zero: Canada. Meet the cast as they face daily challenges to survive in sub-zero temperatures, often in isolation. Can they make a success of their environment and thrive?

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben heads to Slab City in the Californian desert to explore an alternative community.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMFriday 5 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Linz to BratislavaSeason 7 Episode 5 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo travels by train through Austria and the Czech Republic, beginning in the northern Austrian city of Linz, where Adolf Hitler lived as a young boy. From here, Michael travels onto Prague Central Station, where he meets 87-year-old Zuzana Maresova, who, as a seven-year-old girl climbed aboard a train to travel to safety in London with hundreds of other Jewish children. Eventually crossing the Czech border into Slovakia, Michael reaches his final destination, one of Europes youngest capital cities, BratislavaGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Friday 5 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerCassie FarrellDirector

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures to the Emerald Isle to visit Georg and Bettina, an elderly couple from Austria and Germany who made the Irish wilderness their home nearly 40 years ago.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle ventures to the lesser-known Greek island of Andros to visit Sandy, founder of a remote animal shelter perched on the slopes of the islands highest peak.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans push their limits amid the warming tundra and melting landscape. This season, the hardy residents face fresh threats to their survival.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The chilling discovery of 30 massacred bodies on a Swedish Island reveals an ancient Nordic murder mystery - the story of how a warrior tribe was brutally murdered by their rivals. 2/6

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace discovers how one of Britains largest bakeries makes up to one and a half million loaves of bread a week, and Cherry Healey goes inside one of the largest flour mills in the country to discover what it takes to make the perfect flour.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild
programme.desc: Rescuers in South Africa try to combat Broken Heart Syndrome in wild dogs separated from their families. In Wyoming scientists discover the tiny swift foxs chances of survival can depend on their personality. In the mountains of Japan a naturalist is on the hunt for the extinct Japanese Wolf after an encounter that he believes proves they still exist. Conservationists in North America are in a race against time to save the red wolf as less than 20 remain in the wild.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMMonday 8 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Stockholm to the Arctic CircleSeason 7 Episode 6 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo embarks on a thousand-mile journey from the Swedish capital of Stockholm to Abisko in the northern reaches of the Arctic Circle. In Stockholm, Michael braves a precarious tour of the city from its rooftops before boarding a heritage tram to get the lowdown on 1930s Sweden from an expert. Moving on, he finishes his journey deep in the Arctic Circle at a remote climate research station. He also has lunch with traditional Sami people in Vilhelmina and checks into an ice hotelGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Monday 8 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerBen RowlandDirector

programme.title: Inside the Factory

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough explores the dangerous frontiers created by the worlds coasts, where animals fight for survival amidst constant change. On South Africas Robberg Peninsula, thousands of Cape fur seals are squeezed onto a small ledge. A yearling pup escapes into the water, where the clumsy youngster becomes nimble and graceful. In recent years, this coast has been home to unprecedented numbers of great white sharks, and the seal colony must band together if theyre to see off the worlds most notorious predator. The Arctic coast is the scene of the biggest seasonal transformation on earth, and the melting of billions of tonnes of ice brings short-lived opportunities to these coastal waters. Animals arrive en masse, perhaps the strangest of which is the sea angel. This beguiling creature has a devilish side its a voracious predator whose ambush wouldnt be amiss in a sci-fi horror. On Namibias infamous Skeleton Coast, where the worlds oldest desert meets the cold Atlantic, we meet some unexpected residents. Hungry lions discover this coast for the first time in 40 years and try their luck in a huge seabird colony. Coasts attract visitors from far afield. A southern right whale reaches her journeys end at Peninsula Valdes, Argentina. In British Columbia, terrestrial garter snakes take the plunge into chilly waters in search of a meal. In tropical Raja Ampat, Indonesia, coral reef is sheltered by forest. Mangrove trees are salt-tolerant and rooted in the seabed, providing a unique opportunity for archer fish, which use jets of water like arrows to shoot down insects from high above. By contrast, the shallow lagoons of Mexicos Yucatan are very exposed. Its here in these hostile, hypersaline pools that Caribbean flamingos choose to nest, but can their offspring survive the tropical storms that have arrived early? Coasts are the front line in our changing world. Increasingly unpredictable storms and sea level rises are urgent threats to those that make their homes near the coast, including nearly 40% of the worlds human population. On tiny Raine Island, tens of thousands of female green turtles come ashore to nest, but many are stranded by the ebbing tide. The island is on borrowed time. This, the worlds largest green turtle rookery, is set to disappear beneath the waves. The end of the episode reveals the speed of change over the course of Sir Davids lifetime. His was the first filming expedition in 1957. Little could he have known just how much the island would change in 66 years.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels east through the Balkans along the most exotic section of the Orient Express. His destination is Istanbul, a multi-ethnic city where Europe and Asia meet via an underground railway. 1/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Alaskans must rely on family to overcome rising waters as they seek the springs offerings. The Hailstones must work together to overcome a quickly flooding tundra.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to one of Britains furthest outposts, the Shetland Islands, to meet Helen and Jason - a couple just a few years into their new life on the edge of the weather-beaten island of Yell.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: A stunning discovery in the Mediterranean reveals a lost Roman city- and the untold story of an industrial capital made rich by supplying every corner of the empire. 4/6

programme.title: Mammals: Making Of
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale. 1/6

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: The presenter hikes the Great Glen Way in Scotland, a rift valley that cuts through the Highlands from the foot of Ben Nevis to Loch Ness

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: This comedy pair have only recently got to know each other and couldnt be more different - Darren is a former bouncer and self-confessed city boy with an obsession for social media, and Ria is full of adventurous spirit with a PhD and autism. Shes persuaded him to go rogue and hit South Africa, and its 1.2 million square kilometres of wilderness just waiting to be explored. They begin their 800km journey getting to know each other better in Cape Town before heading inland and off-road, tackling ancient valleys, jagged mountains and vast plains seeking out adventure on their way to the tip of the continent. This whirlwind trip into nature and the unknown helps them both face things in life they find a challenge.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: The return of the programme in which Ben Fogle meets people who have moved to inhospitable parts of the world after leaving the rat race behind. He begins by travelling to the swamplands of southern Georgia in America to spend time with 64-year-old Colbert, a former financier who now lives in his hand-built wooden cabin. Ben learns some of the vital skills needed to survive in this dangerous backwater, including skinning roadkill, spearing frogs and drinking swamp water.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green walks in the footsteps of the brave soldiers of the D-Day landings in Normandy, France, on an emotional journey of sacrifice and courage. 4/8

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The team heads to the icy, barren mountains of Patagonia in search of a deep-sea delicacy, the Patagonian Toothfish, which sells for $100 per kilo in the fish markets of North America.

programme.title: Egyptian Tomb Hunting
programme.desc: Tony Robinson enters tombs that have been sealed shut for thousands of years, and discovers hieroglyphs that have only ever been seen by the ancient Egyptians who created them.

programme.title: Ben Fogles Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Ben visits the Caribbean island of Montserrat, where a volcano devasted large areas in the 1990s. Within two years most of the population had fled their homes. Ben uncovers unique stories of heroism and loss.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Lamminhenkinen kisareality. Hyvantuulisessa ompelukisassa 10-12 harrastajaa ottaa haasteen vastaan ja neulan kateensa kilpaillakseen paremmuudesta. Kipailijoita testataan kaikessa ompeluun liittyvassa, materiaalien hallinnassa, ompelutekniikassa ja suunnittelussa. Jokaisessa jaksossa on kolme erilaista tehtavaa ja juontajana toimii koomikko Joe Lycett. Sarja on ollut suosittu Britanniassa ja se on koonnut television eteen seka innostuneet harrastajat etta asiaan perehtymattomat. (The Great British Sewing Bee, S5-7. Britannia, 2019-2021.)

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When the old Rooster Beetle comes to the end of his crowing days, everyone worries for Mush-Mush. Rooster is Mush-Mushs favourite. But Mush-Mush insists he is fine when everyoneknows he is not. So Mushpot and Starmush help him understand that its okay to show hisfeelings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and friends favourite play tree the Fun Tree - is rotten and doomed. But Mush-Mush refuses to give up on it. In a last ditch effort to save the tree, our friends adventure off to try and track down the legendary Starmush, hoping his mysterious healing powers can save it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends mission to return it to Mush Mountain. Two problems though: there is a Beetle Boom on and all the beetles try to charge and knock over Mushables, and Lilit has always wanted to see an egg hatch so secretly drags her feet...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. But Cheps new friend must migrate with all the other weevils -Except he doesnt know how to fly! Chep must teach him to fly while overcoming his own secret fear of heights.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a friends tree mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes on a camping trip, although they cant really agree on why. Freds desire for the gang to get in touch with their natural instincts and hones their mystery skills, turns into on-the-job training as Viking Ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away or worse.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred staat terecht, veroordeeld voor het brein achter alle mysteries die hij heeft opgelost. Met de hulp van zijn advocaat, Daphne, gaan ze terug naar de gebeurtenissen van de dag in een stad die sinds de jaren 1950 was verlaten vanwege een giftige chemische lekkage waar een toxische mutant iedereen die in de buurt van de stad komt geterroriseert.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesnt want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landladys back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before hes chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but its too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop until hes thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny get the day off from Lamput chasing, and receive a super important assignment: go to the train station, and pick up the Boss beloved mom. The Boss really needs to reassess his delegation choices.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is stuck in the lab with a dangerous robot on the loose! Its up to the combined effort of the two Docs and the entire Lab team to save him before it is too late.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are on holiday and board a high-speed train only to realise that Lamput is also on the same train, except hes in First Class! During the train journey, the Docs try to get from Coach into First Class but are refused entry by the trains Captain. They then disguise themselves as train staff and finally get in, ready to capture the unsuspecting Lamput.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. They use the arm to transform Grizzy into a cherub, despite himself.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When they find a book on Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop- a spray that creates a tiny cop that chases Jerry around.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry and Tuffy discover Gingers surprise for Rick in the garage: a brand-new air hockey table. They enjoy floating in zero gravity before Tom comes in and stops the fun. Soon, Butch challenges Tom to a game, until they start chasing Tuffy into the house and out back.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry break a picture frame on the wall, Rick gives Tom an ultimatum that hes out for good if he breaks one more thing. Despite Toms earnest response, he breaks something right after Rick leaves to purchase a new frame. Attempting to fix the problem, Tom borrows tools and coveralls from a repair truck nearby but cant stop breaking things in the repair process.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Jerry overhears that a brand-new butler will arrive at the household later that day, the crafty mouse whips together a butlers outfit and knocks on the door, pretending to be the new arrivalto get unbridled access to the pantry. How long will Jerrys disguise work, and what happens when the real butler arrives?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom goes through reverse evolution and is transformed into a swamp monster, he uses it to his advantage, scaring creatures that frightened him earlier. Soon he sees Van Mouseling in the woods and cant resist chasing him all over.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Kept awake by Tom watching TV, Jerry goes outside and encounters some lightning bugs. The smallest one cant keep up, so Jerry steals Toms energy drink for the little guy. It helps, but soon the super-charged bug causes unexpected issues for Tom and Jerry.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. Its up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred gets a call for help from Chuck, his daredevil of a best friend, leading the gang on a rescue mission deep in the caverns of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Scoobys dream come true as the gang visits the set of his favorite TV show and he meets the star, his celebrity crush, a dog actress who plays a detective on the screen. Now all Scooby has to do is work up the courage to actually talk to her while also solving the mystery of the monstrous Gargoyle attacking the production!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks installed a state-of-the-art home automation system.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Problems result after Tom and Jerry use too much of a witches disappearance potion.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is left alone in an empty house after Rick, Ginger and Tom are nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry listen to the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate end chasing a superior opponent.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesnt want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Toms ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another attempt on Jerrys part to elude Tom, Jerry overhears Rick and Ginger talk about the possibility of getting rid of that useless cat. When Ginger sounds like shes considering the possibility, Jerry cant believe his ears!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from stealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: An action-packed music video of the Batwheels most exciting adventures set to an extended version of the series theme song.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build an ice bowling alley in Looneyburg. Her homesickness causes setbacks until the crew helps her feel better.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build them a home underground. Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a small bump. Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny crashes Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around yum! But hes told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artists studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time hes let in, but will Beans fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and hell get a months rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout doing all Mr Beans work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new friend has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. He will finally be able to rid of the Lemmings, without even leaving the couch!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To make sure that the Lemmings dont snatch his chocolate spread while hes taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. The Lemmings try in vain to break into the fridge until they see Grizzy open the door while sleepwalking. Unfortunately, Grizzy wakes up at the crucial moment. The Lemmings do everything possible to make him fall back asleep as quick as possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have invented a new popcorn game which consists of throwing popcorn and catching it with their mouths. Grizzy notices that his lovely she-bear seems to be drawn by the scent of the grilled corn and decides to invite her over for a snack, just the two of them. But first, he must quickly recover the popcorn from the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear hes in love with, for she truly adores this rhythm. He finds a learning kit at the rangers home which has a dance carpet with footprints that light up in rhythm. The only problem is that Lemmings want the ghetto-blaster to continue their rave party to an entirely different beat.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy undergoes an identity crisis after a run-in with a metal pan. Can the Lemmings help him get back to normal?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the Lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied break dance the Lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, its panic all round! Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky threads are perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy rapidly discovers that the true interference is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river, he sparks a general power outage. Unless he finds an alternative source of energy, and before the Lemmings do, he can kiss his TV night goodbye!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
