programme.desc: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the rangers cabin. Can he bring them to her without the Lemmings ruining them?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Decidedly, this is not Grizzys day: after making a fool of himself in front of the she-bear hes in love with, he is ousted from the log cabin by the Lemmings, who are in top form.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realizes its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through the rangers books of fairytales the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By pure chance, Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the rangers console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is enjoying his bath time while Jerry bathes Tuffy. Tuffy ends up floating off in a bubble and lands in Toms bath. Jerry throws in all of the bath bombs creating a massive amount of bubbles. In the end, they all work together to get clean.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids, but it soon interferes with Hoots Talon and his friends activities. / The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesnt speak up.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Bugs, Lola, Daffy, Porky and Tweety utilise their vehicles to tackle construction projects, all the while acquiring valuable insights.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France where they are encouraged to make their design bigger and more fun.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson in asking for permission when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage. / Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show, but when Batman needs their help, they must choose between winning the competition and their responsibilities to fight crime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur. / When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day! But when the Food Snail falls for, and takes off after, the Travel Snail, Pancake Day has to be cancelled. Chep sees an opportunity to save the day for his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: MMs favourite frog has had its home taken over by a lizard. Mushpot says not to interfere - nature must run its course. But Lilit feels so sorry for the frog she takes it back to Mushton where it causes havoc. Now our friends must lure the frog back to its home where it deals with the lizard itself.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Its Fool the Forest Day! Mushables pull pranks all over Mushton, and Mush-Mush has an epic one planned. But our Mushlers spill Chanterelles paint by accident, and now they must replace it by finding a rare Sloof beetle they have never heard of.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miffs tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide its time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out. Our friends ask Mushpot to step up from being their coach to racing with them. The Mushelder is reluctant at first but soon reveals the tough competitor he is!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a home in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables embedded piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing in front of all the other Mushables... who are terrified at the idea! But Lilit doesnt have the heart to admit this to Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. But this just shows that Mushpot is no longer able to do all those things. Sigh! However, when our friends find a map that points to a treasure he buried when he was a Mushler, Mushpot realises its just the Mushler experience he needed.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush cant figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy... until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! Convinced he can now predict the future, Mush-Mush starts making predictions for everyone in Mushton...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her...Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: In the season two premiere episode, the gang force an over-worked Fred (FRANK WELKER) to relax and take some time off from mystery solving.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang rushes Scooby to an animal hospital when he suddenly falls ill. But things go from bad to worse when they discover the Gothic, old hospital is also home to a rampaging werewolf!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized Best in Show ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build an ice bowling alley in Looneyburg. Her homesickness causes setbacks until the crew helps her feel better.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunias Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddys picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines and soon enough, hes been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like hes cheating!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs and Lamput are excited because the FunFair is in town! But after the Docs cause havoc for the Carnival Clown during his juggling act, Lamput tries to make things right. The Clown is delighted in his new found friend and the two of them disappear into his House of Fun, with the Docs giving chase. But not all is as it seems inside the mysterious fun house, and the Docs have to come up with a cunning plan to capture Lamput and avoid upsetting the Clown any more!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Skullie warns Tom that its almost midnight, so hed best be on alert for one of the Catsylvania ghouls to show up. Tom reaches for a towel to wipe the soap out of his eyes but is shocked to discover that hes not using a towel at all, but a Mummy-cats wrap! Soon, the Mummy-cat finds ways to freak out Tom and befuddle him, Jerry and Tuffy all over the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry work to create a perfect perfume for Toodles, and end up creating a storm from the clouds of perfume.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Butch both arrive to ask out Toodles, their competitive behavior prompts her to send them away to a charm school she recently attended. But how will they fare in the grueling etiquette courses taught by elegant cat instructors?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Things go awry when Cates orders Tom to clean and inspect the family automobile. Tom, Jerry and Tuffy end up taking the car into the countryside and doing their best to control it. As Tom reads and attempts to follow the instruction manual, Jerry and Tuffy help, but they also suffer many near-misses.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch gets muscled out of his alley by a bullying runt of an alley cat and Tom, Jerry and Spike team up to help Butch win back his territory (and keep him out of theirs).

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry help a runaway champion horse become competitive again.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: While Green Lantern is having his spaceship repaired in the Batcave, the Batwheels want to play with his adorable alien pet, only to discover that this cute critter has wild alien powers!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen van de enge Crystal Crawler - een vleermuisachtig monster - moet de gang de Crystal Canopy in - een doolhof van complexe kristalformaties. Om het nog erger te maken, kunnen ze niet praten in de Canopy, omdat zelfs het kleinste beetje geluid ervoor kan zorgen dat alle kristallen om hen heen zullen vallen.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Ondanks dat Velma een hekel heeft aan water, gaat de gang aan boord van een cruiseschip van Freds neef. Maar een waterfobie is hun minste zorg wanneer een angstaanjagend zeemonster het schip aanvalt.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spikes a sore loser. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the sore into sore loser by biting Toms finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spikes right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just cant win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry each build their own booby-trapped bunker.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its summer and Spikes the primary beneficiary of Ricks daily grilling ritual; the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realizes its time to back off the beef. Spike orders Tom to hide the tempting T-bones and no matter what he says or does dont let him have them! Of course its a lose-lose scenario for Tom; Spike becomes angry if Tom caves in to his demands and gives him the steaks and even angrier if he doesnt! When Jerry moves one of the nightly T-bones from Toms latest hiding place, it begets a series of unfortunate events when Spikes hunger becomes too much and he demands Tom give him his steak back! Jerry enjoys the show and the food (cat and mouse dinner theater). In the end, Spike loses the extra weight from chasing Tom. When Jerry cant fit in his mouse hole because of the weight hes gained justice is served!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detective to findhis one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderellawith a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show

Butch and Tom go toe-to-toe for the honor.But when Tom manages to nab the spot, he winds up disappearing, too! Now its up to Jerry to solve the case!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks required not to eat or drink for 12 hours.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany -- hes losing his hair! Paranoid hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.desc: Lamputs been caught! The Docs dont have much to do now but to give tours to visiting students. Until one of these students, Tuzki specifically, gets lost. Will Tuzki find his way back to class? Not unless Lamput has something to do with it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean would like to learn to play a Beethoven symphony, so he arranges a piano, a music book, a candlestick and a very patient piano teacher. It can be done this way too, Liberace!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes part in a Fun Run. He starts next to his biggest enemy: the fat guy who stole his parking space. Fun Run or not, Bean is going to beat this guy at the finish line, even if he has to take a taxi along the way.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzys in love thinks shes a Lemming. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When Happy Birthday rings out, the surpriiiiiise! is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question. From that point on, Grizzy has only one objective: stop the din, which is not at all helping his migraine headache. But for the Lemmings, the party must go on at any price.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzys adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back. But the Lemmings, who are riding on the back of a bucking caribou, realize that the flower makes their mount sneeze, which only makes the game ten times more fun!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds two identical vases in a Native American chest. They are communicating vessels, so if he sticks his hand in one, it comes out the other, regardless of the distance between them. This should satisfy Grizzys natural lazy streak, unless the Lemmings realise the incredible games they could play with the magic vases.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets you wind back the minute that has just passed by and it can even stop time and movement in ones surroundings. This will give him a sure advantage over the Lemmings, provided of course they dont get their hands on it.

programme.desc: The Lemmings draw inspiration from lessons they find in a martial arts book and start breaking every wooden object they can get their hands on into two.

programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing beach party inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Koopenhaminan lentokentalla
programme.desc: The Security and Fire and Rescue teams are two vital units at Copenhagen Airport. They maintain the safety of the thousands of travellers passing through each day.

programme.title: Romuaittojen aarteet
programme.desc: Henry ja Sam etsivat Buckinghamshiresta kadotettuja autoalan helmia myytavaksi. He loytavat kaytto- ja hoyrymoottoreita seka vanhoja bensakanistereita.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: Joka kevat peloton joukko miehia ja naisia uskaltautuu syvalle Appalachian metsiin uhmaten lakia, kilpailijoita ja luontoa pitaakseen vuosisatoja vanhan kasityoviskin perinteen elossa.

programme.title: Into the Jungle with Ed Stafford

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Nashvillen huutokauppa vetaa jalleen ostajia puoleensa sekalaisella tarjonnallaan, johon kuuluu mm. rekisterikilpia.

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Sarjassa kierretaan maailmalla huutamassa kilpaa noutamatta jaaneita matkalaukkuja, lunastamattomia tilauksia ja alkuperaisten omistajiensa unohtamia loytotavaroita. Mita sokkona ostetuista laukuista ja paketeista paljastuu? Kuka huutokauppakonkareista onnistuu huutamaan itselleen arvokkaimman sisallon?

programme.desc: Drew haastaa insinoorin korjaamaan huonokuntoisen, tunnetun 80-luvun esineen. Entisoija James korjaa 150 vuotta vanhan mestariteoksen reippaalla otteella.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: On vuoden pisin paiva, ja Finias ja Ferb ottavat siita kaiken irti ja matkustavat maailman ympari yhdessa paivassa. Samana aikaan aiti ja isa lahtevat viikonloppumatkalle ja jattavat Candacen vastaamaan kodista. Han miettii, karayttaisiko veljensa vai lahtisiko heidan mukaansa Pariisiin tapaamaan Jeremya. Karaytys vai Jeremy? Han paattaa lahtea poikien mukaan todistaakseen, etta Jeremy yha pitaa hanesta. Matkan varrella Finiasin ikuinen optimismi joutuu koetukselle ja hanen on voitettava epailyksensa paastakseen kotiin ennen auringonlaskua.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende pnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Tanavu aasta kalaks valitud Euroopa angerjas on kriitiliselt ohustatud liik, ometi jatkatakse tema puugi ja tarbimisega nii meil kui ka mujal Euroopas. Tutvume lahemalt selle omaparase kalaga ja uurime, mida tuleks teha, et tal oleks tulevikku. Taastav pllumajandus kogub mitmel pool maailmas populaarsust, sest toetab lisaks jatkusuutlikule tootmisele ka umbritsevat keskkonda. Kulastame Inglismaal uhte farmi, kus on juba sadu aastaid jarjepidevalt talupidamisega tegeletud ja uurime, milliseid vtteid seal kasutatakse. Karl Adami jalgib sookiuru tegemisi. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Kuidas sai uhest vanast ja vaarikast tuuleveskist sepikoda ning millist tood sepad Lauri ja Harri seal tapselt teevad? Reporter-toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoor Mikk Mae.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Catalina on Pelayo ettepanekust okeeritud. Markii tabab Candela raamatukogust. Vanematel on Leonorile hea uudis. Mara vallandatakse.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Nikke ja Artturi silme all minestanud Milena seisund tekitab haiglas kusimusi. Aino on tudruku parast mures ja mure suveneb veelgi, kui Milena peigmees haiglasse tuleb. Jesse peab oma kaitumise parast Marjuti ees aru andma. Jannica otsustab baarihtul Maxi vrgutada.

programme.title: Martin Veinmann. Elu keset teatrit
programme.desc: 48 aastat on Martin Veinmann manginud uhes ja samas Draamateatris. Teinud krvalepikeid kulalisnaitlejana teistes teatrites, saanud mangida nii filmides kui ka telelavastustes. Ta on andnud oma teadmisi edasi noortele naitlejatele. Armastanud ja loonud pere. Kogunud kuhjade kaupa elukogemust, millest nii mndagi juab vahetult enne suurt sunnipaeva tehtud intervjuus ka televaatajateni. Saatejuht Grete Lbu, reissoor Annika Koitmaa, juhtoperaator Tanel Velli-Vallik, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske. Tana on Martin Veinmannil 70. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Uudis doktor Martini lahkumisest levib kulas kulutulena. Helen kutsub Louisa ja Martini Chrisi sunnipaevale, kus Martin lobiseb valja, et Chris puudis kord Louisat suudelda. Caitlini keldris lhkeb veetoru ja ta suudistab selles Berti. Al kutsub Morwenna piknikule. Nad on igel ajal iges kohas, et paasta Chris ja Helen.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ventress takistab pankrotistunud farmeril oma viha panga peale valja elamast. Vernon alustab madarikaari, kuid taipab peagi, et ei talu selle lhna.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Linnapea teab Raimi minevikust rohkem, kui mees sellest ise raakinud on. Are uritab Raimile lahemale saada, kuid lootusetult. Ahven saab teada, et Ruudi arreteeriti ja ta pgeneb Jurka juurde maale. Raim sidab Tallinnasse ja kohtub rongis Pillega. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Sel korral on Eesti mang muusikalainel. Oma teadmised panevad proovile Grete Paia, Sven Lhmus ja Tambet Mumma. Saadet juhib ja kusimusi esitab Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Pealtnagija tahed
programme.desc: Pealtnagija tahed toob vaatajani saatesarja viimaste aastate saravaimad persoonid. Tana on Tiina Pargil 83. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Teenijad on Maraga juhtunu parast nordinud. Markii otsustab Candela rikkumise unustada. Abel jatkab Jana toetamist. Cruzil on plaan Currost vabanemiseks.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Johanna ja Maxi suhtesse tekib aina rohkem mrasid ning Max tudineb Ada ees head nagu tegemast. Ilmari on Ira omavolilisest kaitumisest rabatud. Aino kohtub parast tood Kaiusega ja nad jaavad Nikkele vahele. Kaius kaitub siiski dentelmenina ja see tstab oluliselt tema aktsiaid Aino silmis.

programme.title: Maailm ja mnda
programme.desc: Andres Dvinjaninov armus Menorcal hobustesse. Sellel saarel jumaldatakse hobuseid. Puhapaeva hommikuti toimuvad saare pealinna Mahoni hipodroomil viduajamised ja iga lugupidav kulaline teeb panuse oma lemmikhobusele - Andres tegi hobusele nr 6. Saates naete, mis edasi juhtus. Ciutadella oli saare tahtsaim linn kuni inglaste tulekuni 18. sajandil. Raagitakse, et selles linnas on uhe elaniku kohta kige rohkem losse. Oleme kulas krahv Carlos De Salottil, kes raagib oma uhkest suguvsast, kuid Andrest oma voodisse pikutama ei luba. Menorca uks agedamaid naisi on Nordic Walking Worldi maailmarekordi omanik Elana Segzodaite, ta petab Andrest igesti kaima. Igakevadise Menorca regati filmimine jai poolikuks, sest seal hakkas juhtuma nii mndagi... Saatesse mahtus ka kohtumine miljonar Marcos Martiniga, kes on investeerinud 40 miljonit enda startuppidega tegelevasse firmasse. Ja lpuks juame maale Luca Pons Olivese tallu, kus valmistatakse midagi eriti maitsvat. Menorcal filmisid Andres Dvinjaninov, Tiina Park ja Peeter levain. Saate tootis Free Studio.

programme.title: Madat omenat
programme.desc: Tuomas leiab Onerva uimastatu ja apaatsena ning ta tahab naise koju viia. Lundsten veenab meest, et kik on korras. Ritval nnestub naha Lundsteni manipuleerivaid ravimeetodeid.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mertoni nbu, kuulus laulja ja laulukirjutaja Deborah Vine, saabub Aidensfieldi ning leiab turunii, kus toole asuda.

programme.title: nne 13
programme.desc: Allan solvub Are peale ja joob end purju. Pder paastab Mailise Malle Nurme jutuvada kaest. Are vihastab Mailise ja Pdra peale. Raim kulastab Tallinnas oma endist pruuti Aimet, kes on aheldatud ratastooli. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Milena palub Aino abi, et haiglast pgeneda, Aino kaasab plaani ka Nikke. Paraku toob nende paasteoperatsioon kaasa ahvardusena tunduva snumi. Jesse saab isalt teate, mis ta roopast valja viib. Max ja Jannica astuvad oma suhtes jargmise sammu ning see ajendab Johannat tegudele.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Manuel kahetseb oma eluvalikuid. Petra palub Teresalt andeks. Vera tunnetab teiste vastumeelsust. Abel uritab kellavarast tabada.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Tahelepanu! Tegemist on teadusega
programme.desc: Eesti teadlased teevad iga paev avastusi, mis aitavad muuta meie tulevikku targemaks, turvalisemaks ja pnevamaks. Klipisari viib vaataja laboritesse ja katsevaljakutele, kus sunnivad ullatuslikud ideed ning avanevad teadusmaailma salaparased telgitagused. Reissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Kaheosaline dokumentaal, mis jutustab, kuidas nukogude ajal Eesti NSV naiste murdmaakoondise juures alustanud usinast ja uuenduslikust eesti treenerist sai rahvusvahelise murdmaasuusatamise uks mjukam ning tuntum spetsialist, kes tstis sportlasi olumpiapjedestaalidele, aga havitas ka karjaare. Ta palvis tunnustust, auhindu ja kiitust, aga pettis samal ajal keeruliste kombinatsioonidega dopingukontrolle, sponsoreid ning spordispru. Mati Alaver - valgusest varju on traagiline lugu poorasest vaimustusest ja rangast pettumusest, mille telgitagustes peitub palju pooltoone ning fakte, mida uldsus esimest korda kuuleb. Autor-stsenarist Mihkel Karmas, reissoorid Raivo Maripuu, Vladlen Pobjarin, toimetajad Kristjan Pihl, Taavi Eilat, Merilin Parli, Uljana Kuzmina, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kultuuri kodu
programme.desc: Kultuuri kodu on koht kigile Eesti kirjanikele, muusikutele, kunstnikele, arhitektidele, disaineritele, teatri- ja filmiinimestele. See on ruumikas pesapaik, kuhu mahuvad kik kenasti ara ja head kultuuri pole ju kunagi liiga palju. Eesti Kultuurkapitali sajanda juubeli puhul koputame kultuuri kodu uksele ja vaatame, kes neist meie aega ja ruumi kujundavatest loojatest parajasti kodus juhtub olema. Luhiportreede sarja reissoor on Erle Veber, tekste kirjutab Urmas Vadi ja loeb Marika Vaarik, arhiivis toimetab Ruth Alakula, kaamerat juhib Manuel Magi ning mikrofoni hoiab Mart Kessel-Otsa. Tana on Kaljo Kiisa 100. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Reissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Raamatuaasta puhul vrustab kirjandusminister Mart Juur Eesti raamat 500 patrooni, president Alar Karist. Kord kuus raagime presidendi jaoks olulistest teostest. Tana kasitleme koos presidendi ja kulalistega 2025. aasta romaanivistluse laureaadi Kaur Riismaa raamatut Vasinud valguse teooria.

programme.title: Hermakula. Kadunud isa
programme.desc: 1960-70ndad tid nukogude Eesti halli ja etableerunud kultuuripilti uue laine andekaid noori poeete ning kirjanikke, maalikunstnikke ja teatriuuendajaid. Kaes oli muutuste aeg ja tunda oli vaba mtte sundi. Evald Hermakula alustas oma teatriteed noore, vihase geeniusena Vanemuise teatris, kus ti lavale mitu siiani legendaarset lavastust. Ta oli teatriuuenduse peamine eestvedaja. Hermakula suund oli selge eemale tekstist ja mistusparasusest alateadvuse poole. Taispikk dokumentaalfilm raagib loo autori kasuisast Evald Hermakulast (1941-2000), karismaatilisest naitlejast, lavastajast ja vasimatust teatriuuendajast. Filmis segunevad lavastuslikud ja autori isiklikud malupildid dokumentaalse arhiivimaterjaliga ning Hermakula kaasaegsete mtetega teatrist, elust ja surmast. Film uurib lavastaja ja kunstniku loomepsuhholoogiat ning selle totaalset mju labi Hermakula traagilise elutee, mis lppes vabasurmaga. Reissoor Maria Avdjushko, operaator Mait Maekivi, helilooja Sheripov, produtsent Pille Runk, tootjad Allfilm ja Ugri Film O. 6. detsembril on Evald Hermakula 84. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: 4x4. Island
programme.desc: Sarja esimeses osas saab meie reis alguse ja selleks, et lpuks Islandile kohale juda, tuleb sita labi mitme maa ning ule mitme mere. Rootsi-Taani praami oodates teeme aega parajaks ja kulastame kohalikku ning erakordselt pneva asukohaga lennundusmuuseumi. Seejarel otsime Taani judes sobiliku laagrikoha, et hommikul jargmise praamiga sihtpunkti juda. Kohale judes on olud aga eeldatust veidi erinevad. Reissoor Vaino Laisaar, tootja Matkafilm O.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mertoni nbu, kuulus laulja ja laulukirjutaja Deborah Vine, saabub Aidensfieldi ning leiab turunii, kus toole asuda.

programme.title: 55-mis siis!
programme.desc: Aasta siis oli 65. Eesti esimene seebikas kupatab aiatoodele esimese meeleheitel koduperemehe. Linna peal aga kaivad jutud, et telemaja polegi telemaja, vaid hoopis staaride sunnitusmaja. Raagime telelegendidest ja teatrist, mida teles tehti. Reissoor Maire Radsin, saatejuht Johannes Naan, tekstide autor Martin Aare, toimetaja Reet Linna, produtsent Age Kraus.

programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: The Elf on the Shelf: Sweet Showdown
programme.desc: At the Scout Elves Enchanted Cottage, the six teams create an edible shelf for their own Scout Elf and memory-filled snow globe showpieces.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri finds a Mexican restaurant-market combo dishing out tasty tacos al pastor and carnitas tamales in Minnesota, and in Denver, he enjoys a unique dessert specialty.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads to Massachusetts, where he tastes pickle chips and a scone sandwich. Plus, in Colorado, an NFL pro and Triple-D alum team have green chilli and mile-high burgers.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Three champions are determined to defeat judge Alex Guarnaschelli. They are challenged to create a dish using rainbow soup dumplings and cheddar cheese sauce.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Brothers Yaser and Nader are on the verge of losing their French bistro, Gastons. Robert must convince these delusional owners to transform their business.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree is on the ranch cooking up creative new pizzas. She shakes things up with a butternut squash crust pizza and thinks sweet with a brownie pizza.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree beefs things up with four recipes featuring meat. She makes a mashup of steak with creamed greens pasta and uses ground beef in taco tomatoes.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis and Marcus Samuelsson hope two global chefs can defeat Bobby. In round one, the chefs are given 20 minutes to make a dish with rambutan.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Valerie Bertinelli and Amanda Freitag call on two New York chefs to take down Bobby. First, the chefs are challenged to cook with a strong-smelling cheese.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Valerie and Duff ask the seven remaining bakers to create desserts that feature Chinese five-spice powder. One baker decides to make an eclair with pastry cream.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Martha Stewart puts four fearless chefs to the test as they vie for a $50,000 prize. First, she asks them to create a dish with blueberry pie and oysters.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree takes it easy with a range of simple dishes, starting with creamy lemon chicken and sweet potato and mushroom carbonara.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree turns up the heat with some spicy eats. She transforms jalapeno pimento cheese dip into a fiery grilled cheese and makes hot and cheesy baked meatballs.

programme.title: Giada at Home
programme.desc: Giada De Larentiis hosts a star-themed cocktail party. On the menu are small bites like crispy bacon-wrapped dates, crostini with ricotta and chocolate amaretti cookies.

programme.title: Giada at Home
programme.desc: Giada visits LAs Belcampo Meat Company to learn about different meat cuts. Then, she makes flat iron steak with pepper pesto and skirt steak with Asian bruschetta.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay (Holiday Throwdown)
programme.desc: Ina Garten passes the whipped cream as she recruits chefs Amanda Freitag, Aarti Sequeira and Duff Goldman to serve Bobby Flay a slice of humble pie as they bake classic Thanksgiving desserts.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl
programme.desc: Bobby Flay, Maneet Chauhan and Antonia Lofaso cheer on the final five Brawlers as they compete head-to-head in two knockout duels.

programme.title: The Elf on the Shelf: Sweet Showdown
programme.desc: Duff Goldman challenges the bakers to help their Scout Elves take the perfect elfie selfie with an edible backdrop for their photos. Then, the bottom two teams design an edible holiday outfit for judges Kardea Brown and Ashley Holts elf fashion show.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Valerie and Duff ask the seven remaining bakers to create desserts that feature Chinese five-spice powder. One baker decides to make an eclair with pastry cream.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Actor Reid Scott and chef Sunny Anderson team up to beat Bobby. In the first round, chefs Ned Baldwin and Sieger Bayer must cook with black trumpet mushrooms.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Damaris Phillips and Michael Symon are desperate to take down their pal Bobby. They hope New York chefs Andrew Lukovsky and Airis Johnson can do the job.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy dives into menus boasting about their beef. In Minneapolis, he goes to a neighbourhood gastropub serving up sandwiches piled with steak and braised beef.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Denver, Guy tries an Argentinian bistro stuffing their beef empanadas. And in Bayport, he eats at a barbecue joint piling brisket and pulled pork onto plates.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Three champions set out to take down judge Scott Conant. The first-round basket contains canned shrimp, popcorn gelato and mortadella.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine heads to Smiths Soul Food Bistro in Gastonia, North Carolina, where owner Cheryl is an ex-basketball coach on a mission to help her community.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson and Geoffrey Zakarian come together to escort chefs Paddy Coker and Greg Lutes down the red carpet and snub Bobby Flay along the way.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Comedian Samantha Bee and Michael Symon go all out to derail Bobby Flay so chefs Johnny Alvarez and Stanton Bundy can score a win.

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: The three finalists make gingerbread showpieces to mark the 35th anniversary of the Christmas movie Gremlins. Who will win the $25,000 prize?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Valerie and Duff challenge six young bakers to make tasty treats for puppies. The dessert must reflect the puppys first birthday or their life after adoption.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four chefs take on Martha Stewarts unique challenges as they attempt to claim the $50,000 prize. First, the chefs must cook with hasty pudding and mussels.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson and Geoffrey Zakarian come together to escort chefs Paddy Coker and Greg Lutes down the red carpet and snub Bobby Flay along the way.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Kova laki: Erikoisyksikko
programme.desc: Kauden 14 aloitusjaksossa SVU helisee, kun kapteeni Cragen heraa kuolleen seuralaisen, mahdollisen todistajan SVU:n tapauksessa, vieresta omasta sangystaan. Piirissa on kirea tunnelma, kun etsivat kilvoittelevat piirisyyttaja Paula Fosterin kanssa kapteeni Cragenia koskevan tutkimuksen takia. Lisaksi paikalle saapuu uusi kova kapteeni, Steven Harris. Brian Cassidy kulkee rajoilla piilokyttana Bart Ganzelin seuralaisorganisaatiossa, ja etsiva Nick Amaro tuskailee tapauksen ja oman avioliittonsa takia. Osa 1/2.
